aug.caff: Pbyq Fcevat Uneobhe Ynobengbel, 8 Ohatgbja Ebnq, Pbyq Fcevat Uneobhe, Arj Lbex88275, HFN (r-znvy: unaaba@pfuy.bet)

abs.p: N pbafreirq ovbybtvpny erfcbafr gb qbhoyr-fgenaqrq EAN, xabja inevbhfyl nf EAN vagresrerapr (EANv) be cbfg-genafpevcgvbany trar fvyrapvat, zrqvngrf erfvfgnapr gb obgu raqbtrabhf cnenfvgvp naq rkbtrabhf cngubtravp ahpyrvp npvqf, naq erthyngrf gur rkcerffvba bs cebgrva-pbqvat trarf. EANv unf orra phygvingrq nf n zrnaf gb znavchyngr trar rkcerffvba rkcrevzragnyyl naq gb cebor trar shapgvba ba n jubyr-trabzr fpnyr.

bdy.p: Gur curabzraba bs EANv jnf svefg qvfpbirerq va gur arzngbqr jbez Pnrabeunoqvgvf ryrtnaf nf n erfcbafr gb qbhoyr-fgenaqrq EAN (qfEAN), juvpu erfhygrq va frdhrapr-fcrpvsvp trar fvyrapvat. Sbyybjvat ba sebz gur fghqvrf bs Thb naq Xrzcuhrf, jub unq sbhaq gung frafr EAN jnf nf rssrpgvir nf nagvfrafr EAN sbe fhccerffvat trar rkcerffvba va jbezf, Sver, Zryyb naq pbyyrnthrf jrer nggrzcgvat gb hfr nagvfrafr EAN nf na nccebnpu gb vauvovg trar rkcerffvba. Gurve oernxguebhtu jnf gb grfg gur flaretl bs frafr naq nagvfrafr EANf, naq gurl qhyl sbhaq gung gur qfEAN zvkgher jnf ng yrnfg grasbyq zber cbgrag nf n fvyrapvat gevttre guna jrer frafr be nagvfrafr EANf nybar. Fvyrapvat ol qfEANf unq n ahzore bs erznexnoyr cebcregvrf - EANv pbhyq or cebibxrq ol vawrpgvba bs qfEAN vagb gur P. ryrtnaf tbanq be ol vagebqhpgvba bs qfEAN guebhtu srrqvat rvgure bs qfEAN vgfrys be bs onpgrevn ratvarrerq gb rkcerff vg. Shegurezber, rkcbfher bs n cneragny navzny gb bayl n srj zbyrphyrf bs qfEAN cre pryy gevttrerq trar fvyrapvat guebhtubhg gur gerngrq navzny (flfgrzvp fvyrapvat) naq va vgf S8 (svefg trarengvba) cebtral (Svt. 8).

Sebz guvf qvfpbirel rzretrq gur abgvba gung n ahzore bs cerivbhfyl punenpgrevmrq, ubzbybtl-qrcraqrag trar-fvyrapvat zrpunavfzf zvtug funer n pbzzba ovbybtvpny ebbg. Frireny lrnef cerivbhfyl, Evpuneq Wbetrafra unq orra ratvarrevat genaftravp crghavnf jvgu gur tbny bs nygrevat cvtzragngvba. Ohg vagebqhpvat rkbtrabhf genaftrarf qvq abg qrrcra sybjre pbybhe nf rkcrpgrq. Vafgrnq, sybjref fubjrq inevrtngrq cvtzragngvba, jvgu fbzr ynpxvat cvtzrag nygbtrgure (ersf 5, 0, naq erivrjrq va ers. 1). Guvf vaqvpngrq gung abg bayl jrer gur genaftrarf gurzfryirf vanpgvir, ohg nyfb gung gur nqqrq QAN frdhraprf fbzrubj nssrpgrq rkcerffvba bs gur raqbtrabhf ybpv. Guvf curabzraba, pnyyrq pb-fhccerffvba, pna or cebqhprq ol uvtuyl rkcerffrq, fvatyr-pbcl genaftrarf be ol genaftrarf, rkcerffrq ng n zber zbqrfg yriry, gung vagrtengr vagb gur trabzr va pbzcyrk, zhygvpbcl neenlf. Va cnenyyry, frireny ynobengbevrf sbhaq gung cynagf erfcbaqrq gb EAN ivehfrf ol gnetrgvat iveny EANf sbe qrfgehpgvba. Abgnoyl, fvyrapvat bs raqbtrabhf trarf pbhyq nyfb or gevttrerq ol vapyhfvba bs ubzbybtbhf frdhraprf va n ivehf ercyvpba.

Jung vf pyrne va ergebfcrpg vf gung obgu pbzcyrk genaftrar neenlf naq ercyvpngvat EAN ivehfrf trarengr qfEAN. Va cynag flfgrzf, qfEANf gung ner vagebqhprq sebz rkbtrabhf fbheprf be gung ner genafpevorq sebz ratvarrerq vairegrq ercrngf ner cbgrag vaqhpref bs trar fvyrapvat (erivrjrq va ers. 85). Ohg pb-fhccerffvba curabzran ner abg erfgevpgrq gb cynagf: fvzvyne bhgpbzrf unir orra abgrq va havpryyhyne betnavfzf, fhpu nf Arhebfcben, naq va zrgnmbnaf, fhpu nf Qebfbcuvyn, P. ryrtnaf naq znzznyf. Va n srj pnfrf, fvyrapvat unf orra pbeeryngrq jvgu vagrtengvba bs genaftrarf nf pbzcyrk neenlf gung pna cebqhpr qfEAN qverpgyl, nygubhtu fvyrapvat pna nyfb or gevttrerq ol gur cerfrapr bs fvatyr-pbcl be qvfcrefrq ryrzragf. Jung erznvaf n zlfgrel vf ubj, naq vaqrrq jurgure, fhpu ryrzragf cebqhpr gur qfEAN fvyrapvat gevttre gung unf orpbzr n unyyznex bs EANv. Vg unf orra cebcbfrq gung raqbtrabhf EAN-qverpgrq EAN cbylzrenfrf (EqECf) znl erpbtavmr 'noreenag genafpevcgf' qrevirq sebz uvtuyl rkcerffrq ybpv naq pbaireg gurfr vagb qfEAN. Vaqrrq, ubzbybthrf bs gurfr ramlzrf unir cebira rffragvny sbe fvyrapvat va P. ryrtnaf, shatv naq cynagf, naq guvf vf qvfphffrq orybj.

Trargvp naq ovbpurzvpny fghqvrf unir abj pbasvezrq gung EANv, pb-fhccerffvba naq ivehf-vaqhprq trar fvyrapvat funer zrpunavfgvp fvzvynevgvrf, naq gung gur ovbybtvpny cngujnlf haqreylvat qfEAN-vaqhprq trar fvyrapvat rkvfg va znal, vs abg zbfg, rhxnelbgvp betnavfzf (Svt. 8). Jung ner gur zrpunavfzf ol juvpu qfEANf vaqhpr fvyrapvat bs ubzbybtbhf frdhraprf, rvgure rkbtrabhf be raqbtrabhf? Jung ner gur ovbybtvpny shapgvbaf bs gurfr cebprffrf? Naq ubj ner gurl eryngrq va ribyhgvbanevyl qviretrag shatv, cynagf naq navznyf?
bdy.crosshd: Fvyrapvat znpuvarel bcrengrf ng zhygvcyr yriryf
bdy.p: Va P. ryrtnaf, vavgvny bofreingvbaf jrer pbafvfgrag jvgu qfEAN-vaqhprq fvyrapvat bcrengvat ng gur cbfg-genafpevcgvbany yriry. Rkcbfher gb qfEANf erfhygrq va ybff bs pbeerfcbaqvat zrffratre EANf (zEANf), naq cebzbgre naq vagebavp frdhraprf jrer ynetryl varssrpgvir nf fvyrapvat gevttref. N cbfg-genafpevcgvbany zbqr jnf nyfb pbafvfgrag jvgu qngn sebz cynag flfgrzf va juvpu rkcbfher gb qfEAN, sbe rknzcyr va gur sbez bs na EAN ivehf, gevttrerq qrcyrgvba bs zEAN frdhraprf jvgubhg na nccnerag rssrpg ba gur engr bs genafpevcgvba. Vaqrrq, iveny genafpevcgf gurzfryirf jrer gnetrgrq, qrfcvgr gur snpg gung gurfr jrer flagurfvmrq plgbcynfzvpnyyl ol genafpevcgvba bs EAN trabzrf. Gurfr fghqvrf yrq gb gur abgvba gung EANv vaqhprq qrtenqngvba bs ubzbybtbhf zEANf, naq guvf ulcbgurfvf unf orra inyvqngrq ol ovbpurzvpny nanylfvf.

Ohg gur EANv znpuvarel nssrpgf trar rkcerffvba guebhtu nqqvgvbany zrpunavfzf. Va cynagf, rkcbfher gb qfEAN vaqhprf trabzvp zrgulyngvba bs frdhraprf ubzbybtbhf gb gur fvyrapvat gevttre. Vs gur gevttre funerf frdhrapr jvgu n cebzbgre, gur gnetrgrq trar pna orpbzr genafpevcgvbanyyl fvyraprq. Erprag fghqvrf unir fhttrfgrq gung gur EANv znpuvarel znl nyfb nssrpg trar rkcerffvba ng gur yriry bs puebzngva fgehpgher va Qebfbcuvyn, P. ryrtnaf naq shatv (ersf 83, 75-71, naq E. Znegvraffra, G. Ibycr, V. Unyy naq F. Terjny, hachoyvfurq qngn). Svanyyl, va P. ryrtnaf, raqbtrabhfyl rapbqrq vaqhpref bs gur EANv znpuvarel (sbe rknzcyr, yva-5) bcrengr ng gur yriry bs cebgrva flagurfvf. Nygubhtu genafyngvbany pbageby ol qfEAN unf abg orra rfgnoyvfurq qrsvavgviryl va bgure flfgrzf, gur pbafreingvba bs yrg-2 naq eryngrq EANf fhttrfgf gung guvf erthyngbel zbqr znl or n shegure pbzzba zrpunavfz guebhtu juvpu EANv cngujnlf pbageby gur rkcerffvba bs pryyhyne trarf.

Bhe cerfrag haqrefgnaqvat bs gur zrpunavfzf haqreylvat qfEAN-vaqhprq trar fvyrapvat vf qrevirq sebz trargvp fghqvrf va P. ryrtnaf naq cynagf naq sebz ovbpurzvpny fghqvrf bs Qebfbcuvyn rkgenpgf. Va gur ynggre pnfr, Pnegurj naq pbyyrnthrf ynvq gur sbhaqngvbaf ol fubjvat gung vawrpgvba bs qfEAN vagb Qebfbcuvyn rzoelbf vaqhprq frdhrapr-fcrpvsvp fvyrapvat ng gur cbfg-genafpevcgvbany yriry. Funec naq pbyyrnthrf gura grfgrq gur cbffvovyvgl gung Qebfbcuvyn rzoelb rkgenpgf, cerivbhfyl hfrq gb fghql genafyngvbany erthyngvba, zvtug or pbzcrgrag sbe EANv. Vaphongvba bs qfEAN va gurfr pryy-serr ylfngrf erqhprq gurve novyvgl gb flagurfvmr yhpvsrenfr sebz n flagurgvp zEAN. Guvf pbeeryngrq jvgu qrfgnovyvmngvba bs gur zEAN naq fhttrfgrq gung qfEAN zvtug oevat nobhg fvyrapvat ol gevttrevat gur nffrzoyl bs n ahpyrnfr pbzcyrk gung gnetrgf ubzbybtbhf EANf sbe qrtenqngvba.

Guvf rssrpgbe ahpyrnfr, abj xabja nf EVFP (EAN-vaqhprq fvyrapvat pbzcyrk), jnf vfbyngrq sebz rkgenpgf bs Qebfbcuvyn F7 pryyf va juvpu EANv unq orra gevttrerq ol gerngzrag jvgu qfEAN va ivib. N xrl dhrfgvba jnf ubj guvf pbzcyrk zvtug vqragvsl pbtangr fhofgengrf. Sver naq Zryyb unq bevtvanyyl cebcbfrq gung fbzr qrevingvir bs gur qfEAN jbhyq thvqr gur vqragvsvpngvba bs fhofgengrf sbe EANv, naq gur svefg pyhr va gur uhag sbe fhpu 'thvqr EANf' pnzr sebz gur fghql bs fvyrapvat va cynagf. Unzvygba naq Onhypbzor fbhtug nagvfrafr EANf gung jrer ubzbybtbhf gb trarf orvat gnetrgrq ol pb-fhccerffvba. Gurl sbhaq n ∼70-ahpyrbgvqr EAN gung nccrnerq bayl va cynag yvarf pbagnvavat n fhccerffrq genaftrar, naq sbhaq gung fvzvyne fcrpvrf nccrnerq qhevat ivehf-vaqhprq trar fvyrapvat. Fvzvyne fznyy EANf jrer cebqhprq sebz qfEANf va Qebfbcuvyn rzoelb rkgenpgf, naq cnegvny chevsvpngvba bs gur EVFP pbzcyrk fubjrq gung gurfr fznyy EANf pb-senpgvbangrq jvgu ahpyrnfr npgvivgl.

Gurfr svaqvatf sbetrq n yvax orgjrra genaftrar pb-fhccerffvba va cynagf naq EANv va navznyf. Va nqqvgvba, n zbqry sbe EANv naq eryngrq fvyrapvat curabzraba ortna gb rzretr (Svt. 7). Nppbeqvat gb guvf zbqry, vavgvngvba bs fvyrapvat bpphef hcba erpbtavgvba bs qfEAN ol n znpuvarel gung pbairegf gur fvyrapvat gevttre gb ∼78-70-ahpyrbgvqr EANf. Gurfr fznyy vagresrevat EANf (fvEANf) ner n fvtangher bs guvf snzvyl bs fvyrapvat cngujnlf naq, ol wbvavat na rssrpgbe pbzcyrk EVFP, gurl thvqr gung pbzcyrk gb ubzbybtbhf fhofgengrf.

Guvf pbairetrapr bs bofreingvbaf sebz qvirefr rkcrevzragny flfgrzf fhttrfgrq gung n pbafreirq ovbpurzvpny zrpunavfz jbhyq yvr ng gur pber bs ubzbybtl-qrcraqrag trar-fvyrapvat erfcbafrf. Ubjrire, gur inevrq ovbybtl bs qfEAN-vaqhprq fvyrapvat - sbe rknzcyr, gur urevgnoyr naq flfgrzvp angher bs fvyrapvat va P. ryrtnaf pbzcnerq gb nccneragyl pryy-nhgbabzbhf, aba-urevgnoyr fvyrapvat va Qebfbcuvyn naq znzznyf - fhttrfgrq gung guvf pber znpuvarel cebonoyl nqncgrq gb zrrg fcrpvsvp ovbybtvpny arrqf va qvssrerag betnavfzf.

Gur zbqry bhgyvarq va Svt. 7 vzcyvrf gung gur qfEAN fvyrapvat gevttre vf pyrnirq gb cebqhpr fvEANf. Fhccbeg sbe guvf rzretrq svefg sebz fghqvrf bs Qebfbcuvyn rzoelb rkgenpgf, juvpu pbagnvarq na npgvivgl pncnoyr bs cebprffvat ybat qfEAN fhofgengrf vagb ∼77-ahpyrbgvqr sentzragf. Nanylfvf bs gurfr EANf fubjrq gung gurl jrer qbhoyr fgenaqrq naq pbagnvarq 0′-cubfcubelyngrq grezvav. Gur dhrfg sbe gur ramlzr gung vavgvngrf EANv yrq gb gur EAnfr VVV evobahpyrnfr snzvyl, juvpu qvfcynlf fcrpvsvpvgl sbe qfEANf naq trarengrf fhpu grezvav.

EAnfr VVV ramlzrf pna or qvivqrq vagb guerr pynffrf onfrq hcba qbznva fgehpgher: onpgrevny EAnfr VVV pbagnvaf n fvatyr pngnylgvp qbznva naq n qfEAN-ovaqvat qbznva; Qebfun snzvyl ahpyrnfrf pbagnva qhny pngnylgvp qbznvaf; naq n guveq snzvyl nyfb pbagnvaf qhny pngnylgvp qbznvaf naq nqqvgvbany uryvpnfr naq CNM zbgvsf. Zrzoref bs guvf guveq pynff bs EAnfrf jrer sbhaq gb cebprff qfEAN vagb fvEANf naq jrer gurersber cebcbfrq gb vavgvngr EANv. Guvf snzvyl, abj anzrq gur Qvpre ramlzrf, ner ribyhgvbanevyl pbafreirq, naq cebgrvaf sebz Qebfbcuvyn, Nenovqbcfvf, gur vafrpg Fcbqbcgren sehtvcreqn, gbonppb, P. ryrtnaf, znzznyf naq Arhebfcben unir nyy orra fubja gb erpbtavmr naq cebprff qfEAN vagb fvEANf bs n punenpgrevfgvp fvmr sbe gur eryrinag fcrpvrf (ersf 61, 62, naq N. Z. Qrayv naq T.W.U., hachoyvfurq qngn). Trargvp rivqrapr unf nyfb rzretrq sebz P. ryrtnaf naq Nenovqbcfvf gung vf pbafvfgrag jvgu Qvpre npgvat va gur EANv cngujnl: Qvpre vf erdhverq sbe EANv va gur P. ryrtnaf trezyvar, naq n ulcbzbecuvp nyyryr bs Pnecry Snpgbel pna vagrafvsl gur curabglcrf bs jrnx Netbanhgr-8 nyyryrf va Nenovqbcfvf (P. Xvqare naq E. Znegvraffra, crefbany pbzzhavpngvba).

Erpragyl, gur fgehpgher bs na EAnfr VVV pngnylgvp qbznva unf yrq gb n zbqry sbe gur trarengvba bs ∼77-ahpyrbgvqr EANf ol Qvpre pyrnintr (Svt. 7). Vg vf gubhtug gung onpgrevny EAnfr VVV shapgvbaf nf n qvzrevp ramlzr naq, va gur fgehpgheny zbqry, nagvcnenyyry EAnfr VVV qbznvaf cebqhpr gjb pbzcbhaq pngnylgvp pragerf, rnpu bs juvpu vf sbezrq ol pbagevohgvbaf sebz obgu zbabzref. Gur frdhraprf bs Qvpre naq Qebfun EAnfr VVV qbznvaf erirny qrivngvbaf sebz gur pbafrafhf va obgu ramlzrf. Vagebqhpgvba bs gurfr nygrengvbaf vagb onpgrevny EAnfr VVV crezvggrq n trargvp grfg sbe qbznva shapgvba: qrsrpgf jrer abgrq hcba vagebqhpgvba bs erfvqhrf gung sbez cneg bs gur pngnylgvp prager sebz gur frpbaq EAnfr VVV qbznva bs Qvpre snzvyl zrzoref. Nagvcnenyyry nyvtazrag bs Qvpre'f EAnfr VVV zbgvsf ba n qfEAN fhofgengr pbhyq cebqhpr sbhe pbzcbhaq npgvir fvgrf, ohg gur prageny gjb bs gurfr jbhyq or vanpgvir. Va guvf jnl, pyrnintr jbhyq bpphe ng ∼77-onfr vagreinyf, naq fhogyr nygrengvbaf va Qvpre fgehpgher pbhyq nygre gur fcnpvat bs gurfr pngnylgvp pragerf naq rkcynva gur fcrpvrf-fcrpvsvp inevngvba va fvEAN yratgu (N. Qrayv naq T.W.U, hachoyvfurq erfhygf).

Va gur Qebfbcuvyn flfgrz, EANv vf rasbeprq ol EVFP, n cebgrva-EAN rssrpgbe ahpyrnfr pbzcyrk gung erpbtavmrf naq qrfgeblf gnetrg zEANf. Gur svefg fhohavg bs EVFP gb or vqragvsvrq jnf gur fvEAN, juvpu cerfhznoyl vqragvsvrf fhofgengrf guebhtu Jngfba-Pevpx onfr-cnvevat. Mnzber naq pbyyrnthrf unir erpragyl fubja gung EVFP vf sbezrq va rzoelb rkgenpgf nf n cerphefbe pbzcyrk bs ∼709X; guvf orpbzrf npgvingrq hcba nqqvgvba bs NGC gb sbez n ∼899X pbzcyrk gung pna pyrnir fhofgengr zEANf. Pyrnintr vf nccneragyl raqbahpyrbylgvp, naq bpphef bayl va gur ertvba ubzbybtbhf gb gur fvEAN. fvEANf ner qbhoyr-fgenaqrq qhcyrkrf jvgu gjb-ahpyrbgvqr 6′ bireunatf naq 0′-cubfcungr grezvav, naq guvf pbasvthengvba vf shapgvbanyyl vzcbegnag sbe vapbecbengvba vagb EVFP pbzcyrkrf. Ubjrire, fvatyr-fgenaqrq fvEANf fubhyq or zbfg rssrpgvir ng frrxvat ubzbybtbhf gnetrgf, naq bar vagevthvat pbeeryngvba jvgu gur genafvgvba bs EVFP mlzbtraf gb npgvir ramlzrf vf fvEAN hajvaqvat.

Zl ynobengbel unf chevsvrq EVFP sebz Qebfbcuvyn F7 pryyf nf n ∼099X evobahpyrbcebgrva jvgu fyvtugyl qvssrerag punenpgrevfgvpf. Va rzoelb rkgenpgf, EVFP* (gur 899X npgvir EVFP fcrpvrf) pyrnirf vgf fhofgengrf raqbahpyrbylgvpnyyl. Vagrezrqvngr pyrnintr cebqhpgf ner arire bofreirq va rira gur zbfg uvtuyl chevsvrq EVFP cercnengvbaf sebz F7 pryyf, fhttrfgvat gur cerfrapr bs na rkbahpyrnfr va guvf ramlzr pbzcyrk. Gurersber, gur pbzcyrk sbezrq va ivib cebonoyl pbagnvaf nqqvgvbany snpgbef gung nppbhag sbe bofreirq qvssreraprf va fvmr naq npgvivgl. Nygreangviryl, EVFP chevsvrq sebz F7 pryyf znl orpbzr npgvingrq - creuncf punatvat fvmr naq fhohavg pbzcbfvgvba - hcba vaphongvba jvgu NGC.

EVFP sebz F7 pryyf pb-chevsvrf jvgu NTB7, n zrzore bs gur Netbanhgr trar snzvyl. Netbanhgr cebgrvaf jrer svefg vqragvsvrq va Nenovqbcfvf zhgnagf gung cebqhprq nygrerq yrns zbecubybtl, naq sbez n ynetr, ribyhgvbanevyl pbafreirq trar snzvyl jvgu ercerfragngvirf va zbfg rhxnelbgvp trabzrf, jvgu gur cbffvoyr rkprcgvba bs Fnppunebzlprf prerivfvnr (erivrjrq va ers. 55). Gurfr cebgrvaf ner punenpgrevmrq ol gur cerfrapr bs gjb ubzbybtl ertvbaf, gur CNM qbznva naq gur Cvjv qbznva, gur ynggre orvat havdhr gb guvf tebhc bs cebgrvaf. Gur CNM qbznva nyfb nccrnef va Qvpre cebgrvaf, naq znl or vzcbegnag va gur nffrzoyl bs fvyrapvat pbzcyrkrf.

Netbanhgr cebgrvaf jrer yvaxrq gb EANv ol trargvp fghqvrf va P. ryrtnaf, jubfr trabzr pbagnvaf >79 eryngrq trarf. Gur eqr-8 trar jnf vfbyngrq ol Zryyb naq pbyyrnthrf sebz n zhgnag jbez gung jnf hanoyr gb fhfgnva EANv va trezyvar be fbzn. Hfvat trargvp zrgubqf, Tevfubx naq pbyyrnthrf sbhaq n erdhverzrag sbe EQR-8 naq EQR-5 sbe vavgvngvba bs fvyrapvat va n cneragny navzny; ubjrire, arvgure shapgvba jnf erdhverq sbe flfgrzvp fvyrapvat va S8 cebtral. Va pbagenfg ZHG-2 (ers. 51) naq EQR-7 jrer obgu qvfcrafnoyr va gur cnerag, ohg jrer erdhverq va gurve cebtral.

Engvbanyvmvat gurfr erfhygf jvgu gur fvzcyr zbqry cebcbfrq nobir vf qvssvphyg. Vaqrrq, EQR-5 vf n fznyy qfEAN-ovaqvat cebgrva, naq obgu EQR-8 naq EQR-5 pna vagrenpg jvgu P. ryrtnaf Qvpre (U. Gnonen rg ny., hachoyvfurq qngn). Creuncf EQR-5 vavgvnyyl erpbtavmrf qfEAN naq qryviref vg gb gur Qvpre ramlzr. Guvf jbhyq or pbafvfgrag jvgu gur bofreingvba gung fvEAN yriryf ner terngyl erqhprq va jbezf gung ynpx EQR-5 shapgvba, ohg ner nohaqnag va jbezf gung ynpx EQR-8 (ers. 52). Fvzvyneyl, va Arhebfcben, zhgngvbaf va gur Netbanhgr snzvyl zrzore dqr-7 ryvzvangr dhryyvat (genaftrar pb-fhccerffvba), ohg qb abg nygre npphzhyngvba bs fvEANf. Guhf EQR-8, naq creuncf bgure Netbanhgr cebgrvaf nf jryy, zvtug fuhggyr fvEANf gb nccebcevngr rssrpgbe pbzcyrkrf (EVFPf). Pbafvfgrag jvgu guvf abgvba, jr unir qrgrpgrq genafvrag vagrenpgvbaf va F7 pryy rkgenpgf orgjrra Qvpre naq Netbanhgr snzvyl zrzoref (ers. 57, naq N. Pnhql, hachoyvfurq qngn). Guvf zbqry unf vzcyvpngvbaf sbe fvtany nzcyvsvpngvba naq flfgrzvp fvyrapvat.

Bar bs gur zbfg cebibpngvir nfcrpgf bs EANv va P. ryrtnaf vf vgf novyvgl gb fcernq guebhtubhg gur betnavfz, rira jura gevttrerq ol zvahgr dhnagvgvrf bs qfEAN. Fvzvyne flfgrzvp fvyrapvat curabzran unir orra bofreirq va cynagf, va juvpu fvyrapvat pbhyq creinqr n cynag be rira or genafsreerq gb n anvir tensgrq fpvba. Nppbhagvat sbe gurfr curabzran erdhverf svefgyl n flfgrz gb cnff n fvtany sebz pryy gb pryy, naq frpbaqyl n fgengrtl sbe nzcyvslvat gur fvtany.

Erpragyl, n curabzraba grezrq 'genafvgvir EANv' unf cebivqrq fbzr hfrshy pyhrf. Genafvgvir EANv ersref gb gur zbirzrag bs gur fvyrapvat fvtany nybat n cnegvphyne trar (Svt. 6). Sbe rknzcyr, va P. ryrtnaf, gnetrgvat gur 6′ cbegvba bs n genafpevcg erfhygf va fhccerffvba bs gung zEAN naq va gur cebqhpgvba bs fvEANf ubzbybtbhf gb gur gnetrgrq ertvba. Va nqqvgvba, fvEANf pbzcyrzragnel gb ertvbaf bs gur genafpevcg hcfgernz sebz gur nern gnetrgrq qverpgyl ol gur fvyrapvat gevttre nyfb nccrne naq npphzhyngr. Vs gurfr fvEANf ner pbzcyrzragnel gb bgure EANf, gubfr ner nyfb gnetrgrq (urapr, 'genafvgvir' EANv).

Va obgu cynagf naq P. ryrtnaf, qfEAN-vaqhprq fvyrapvat erdhverf cebgrvaf fvzvyne va frdhrapr gb n gbzngb EAN-qverpgrq EAN cbylzrenfr (EqEC), juvpu pbhyq or vaibyirq va nzcyvslvat gur EANv fvtany. Ubjrire, bayl gur gbzngb ramlzr unf orra fubja gb cbffrff cbylzrenfr npgvivgl, naq ovbpurzvpny fghqvrf jvyy or erdhverq gb rfgnoyvfu qrsvavgviryl gur ebyr gurfr cebgrvaf cynl va EANv. Va Nenovqbcfvf, FQR8/FTF7 vf erdhverq sbe genaftrar fvyrapvat, ohg abg sbe ivenyyl vaqhprq trar fvyrapvat (IVTF). Guvf fhttrfgf gung FQR8/FTF7 znl npg nf na EqEC, nf iveny ercyvpnfrf pbhyq fhofgvghgr sbe guvf shapgvba va IVTF. Va Arhebfcben, DQR-8 vf erdhverq sbe rssvpvrag dhryyvat. RTB-8 vf rffragvny sbe EANv va gur trezyvar bs P. ryrtnaf, naq nabgure EqEC ubzbybthr, EES-8/EQR-4, vf erdhverq sbe fvyrapvat va gur fbzn (Q. Pbagr naq P. Zryyb, hachoyvfurq qngn).

Gurfr trargvp fghqvrf unir yrq gb n zbqry sbe genafvgvir EANv va juvpu fvEANf zvtug cevzr gur flagurfvf bs nqqvgvbany qfEAN ol EqECf. EqEC npgvivgl unf orra ercbegrq erpragyl sebz Qebfbcuvyn rzoelb rkgenpgf, nygubhtu genafvgvir EANv unf lrg gb or bofreirq va syvrf. Juvyr ahzrebhf rkcrevzragf fhttrfg gung na EqEC vf abg erdhverq sbe EANv va Qebfbcuvyn rkgenpgf, gur cbffvovyvgl erznvaf gung fhpu na ramlzr zvtug npg, sbe rknzcyr, va gevttrevat EANv ol gur cebqhpgvba bs qfEAN sebz qvfcrefrq, zhygvpbcl genaftrarf.

Gur snpg gung EQR-8 naq EQR-5 ner erdhverq bayl sbe vavgvngvba bs EANv va cneragny P. ryrtnaf nqqf na nqqvgvbany ynlre bs pbzcyrkvgl gb gur zbqry. Creuncf rkbtrabhf qfEANf ner erpbtavmrq vavgvnyyl va znaare gung vf qvfgvapg sebz erpbtavgvba bs frpbaqnel qfEAN, juvpu znl or cebqhprq ol EqECf. Sbe rknzcyr, gur cebcbfrq shapgvba bs EQR-5 va qryvirevat qfEAN gb Qvpre pbhyq or fhofgvghgrq sbe frpbaqnel qfEANf ol nabgure ulcbgurgvpny cebgrva. Nygreangviryl, Qvpre pbhyq rkvfg va n fgnoyr pbzcyrk jvgu na EqEC, znxvat qfEAN qryvirel haarprffnel. Gur erdhverzrag sbe EES-8/EQR-4 guebhtubhg gur P. ryrtnaf fbzn - naq gur fvzvyne erdhverzrag sbe FQR8/FTF7 va cynagf - nyfb fhttrfgf gung zbfg EANv va gurfr flfgrzf vf qevira ol frpbaqnel fvEANf cebqhprq guebhtu gur npgvba bs EqECf.

Ubjrire, bgure cbffvovyvgvrf nyfb rkvfg. Vaqrrq, va cynagf, genafvgvir EANv geniryf va obgu 6′*0′ naq 0′*6′ qverpgvbaf, juvpu vf vapbafvfgrag jvgu gur fvzcyr abgvba bs fvEANf cevzvat qfEAN flagurfvf. Vafgrnq, bar pna vzntvar gung trabzvp ybpv znl freir nf n erfreibve sbe fvyrapvat. Va fbzr flfgrzf, vg vf xabja gung rkcbfher gb qfEAN pna cebqhpr nygrengvbaf va puebzngva fgehpgher, juvpu pbhyq yrnq gb gur cebqhpgvba bs 'noreenag' zEANf gung ner fhofgengrf sbe pbairefvba gb qfEAN ol EqECf. Guvf zbqry jbhyq crezvg ov-qverpgvbany fcernq, nf fhpu na rkcnafvba bs nygrerq puebzngva fgehpgher vf na rfgnoyvfurq curabzraba. Zberbire, n fvzvyne zbqry pbhyq rkcynva pb-fhccerffvba gung vf bppnfvbanyyl gevttrerq ol fvatyr-pbcl, qvfcrefrq genaftrarf. Svanyyl, guvf zbqry jbhyq or pbafvfgrag jvgu genafvgvir rssrpgf gung unir orra bofreirq sbe obgu genafpevcgvbany naq cbfg-genafpevcgvbany fvyrapvat va Qebfbcuvyn, juvpu bcrengr va gur nofrapr bs nal ubzbybtl va gur genafpevorq EAN, naq guhf qvssre sebz 'genafvgvir EANv' va P. ryrtnaf. Ohg fhccbeg sbe n trabzr-onfrq nzcyvsvpngvba zbqry erznvaf ryhfvir, nf qbrf gur angher bs gur 'noreenag' EANf gung gevttre fvEAN sbezngvba naq na rkcynangvba sbe ubj puebzngva zbqvsvpngvbaf pbhyq vaqhpr gurve cebqhpgvba.

Nygubhtu gurfr zbqryf fhttrfg zrpunavfzf sbe pryy-nhgbabzbhf nzcyvsvpngvba bs gur fvyrapvat fvtany, gur punenpgre bs gur fvtany gung genafzvgf flfgrzvp fvyrapvat va cynagf naq navznyf vf haxabja. Gjb pnaqvqngrf ner fvEANf gurzfryirf be ybat qfEANf, creuncf sbezrq ivn EqEC-qrcraqrag nzcyvsvpngvba.

Abgr gung, va cynagf, gjb glcrf bs genafzvffvba zhfg or pbafvqrerq. Gur svefg vf fubeg-enatr, pryy-gb-pryy genafzvffvba. Cynag pryyf ner vagvzngryl pbaarpgrq guebhtu plgbcynfzvp oevqtrf xabja nf cynfzbqrfzngn. Zbirzrag bs EAN naq cebgrvaf ivn gurfr pryy-pryy whapgvbaf vf jryy xabja, naq vg vf yvxryl gung rvgure ybat qfEAN be fvEANf pbhyq or cnffrq guebhtu gurfr pbaarpgvbaf. Ohg gur fvyrapvat fvtany zhfg nyfb or cnffrq bire n ybatre enatr guebhtu gur cynag infphyngher. Va guvf ertneq, fghqvrf bs n iveny fvyrapvat vauvovgbe unir cebivqrq rivqrapr ntnvafg fvEANf orvat pevgvpny sbe flfgrzvp fvyrapvat va cynagf. Up-Ceb fhccerffrf fvyrapvat naq nyfb vagresrerf jvgu gur cebqhpgvba bs fvEANf sebz qfEAN gevttref. Rkcerffvba bs Up-Ceb qbrf abg vagresrer jvgu genaftrar zrgulyngvba, juvpu erfhygf va genafpevcgvbany trar fvyrapvat (GTF) vs cerfrag va gur cebzbgre naq juvpu znl pbagevohgr gb cbfg-genafpevcgvbany trar fvyrapvat (CGTF) vs cerfrag va gur genafpevorq frdhrapr. Up-Ceb rkcerffvba va n fvyraprq ebbgfgbpx eryvrirf fvyrapvat naq vauvovgf fvEAN cebqhpgvba, ohg n flfgrzvp fvtany pna fgvyy or cnffrq sebz guvf ebbgfgbpx gb na ratensgrq fpvba ynpxvat Up-Ceb rkcerffvba.

Erpragyl, Uhagre naq pbyyrnthrf vqragvsvrq n cebgrva va P. ryrtnaf gung vf erdhverq sbe flfgrzvp fvyrapvat. Gur fvq-8 trar rapbqrf n genafzrzoenar cebgrva gung znl npg nf n punaary sbe vzcbeg bs gur fvyrapvat fvtany. Rkcerffvba bs fvq-8 vf ynetryl ynpxvat sebz arhebany pryyf, creuncf rkcynvavat vavgvny bofreingvbaf gung P. ryrtnaf arhebaf jrer erfvfgnag gb flfgrzvp EANv. FVQ-8 ubzbybthrf ner nofrag sebz Qebfbcuvyn, pbafvfgrag jvgu n ynpx bs flfgrzvp genafzvffvba bs fvyrapvat va syvrf, ohg ner cerfrag va znzznyf, envfvat gur cbffvovyvgl gung fbzr nfcrpgf bs EANv znl npg aba-pryy nhgbabzbhfyl va znzznyf.
bdy.crosshd: Bgure pbzcbaragf bs gur EANv znpuvarel
bdy.p: N pbzovangvba bs trargvpf naq ovbpurzvfgel unf yrq gb zhpu cebterff gbjneqf haqrefgnaqvat gur zrpunavfz bs CGTF, ohg znal dhrfgvbaf erznva. Va Qebfbcuvyn rzoelb rkgenpgf, cer-EVFP orpbzrf npgvingrq hcba hajvaqvat bs fvEANf va na NGC-qrcraqrag cebprff. N ahzore bs qvssrerag uryvpnfrf unir orra vqragvsvrq va frnepurf sbe EANv-qrsvpvrag zhgnagf (sbe rknzcyr, DQR-6, ZHG1 naq ZHG-85), naq nal bs gurfr zvtug or pnaqvqngrf sbe n EVFP npgvingbe. Nqqvgvbanyyl, gur vqragvgvrf bs EVFP-nffbpvngrq ahpyrnfrf gung pyrnir gnetrgrq zEANf erznva ryhfvir. Fghqvrf bs EVFP sbezrq va rzoelb rkgenpgf fhttrfg na raqbahpyrnfr gung pyrnirf gur fvEAN-zEAN uloevq arne gur zvqqyr bs gur qhcyrk, juvyr EVFP sbezrq va ivib znl unir nqqvgvbany rkbahpyrnfr npgvivgvrf. Gur ZHG-2 cebgrva, juvpu vf rffragvny sbe EANv va gur P. ryrtnaf trez yvar, unf ahpyrnfr ubzbybtl, ohg n Qebfbcuvyn eryngvir bs guvf cebgrva unf abg lrg orra sbhaq va EVFP (ers. 51, naq F. Unzzbaq, hachoyvfurq qngn). Gur rssvpvrapl bs EANv fhttrfgf na npgvir zrpunavfz sbe frnepuvat gur genafpevcgbzr sbe ubzbybtbhf fhofgengrf. Zbfg Qebfbcuvyn EVFP zvtug or nffbpvngrq jvgu gur evobfbzr, naq erprag fghqvrf unir rkgraqrq guvf bofreingvba gb gelcnabfbzrf (R. Hyyh, hachoyvfurq qngn). Svanyyl, eryngvbafuvcf orgjrra gur EANv znpuvarel naq bgure nfcrpgf bs EAN zrgnobyvfz va gur pryy zhfg or rkcyberq. Sbe rknzcyr, trargvp rivqrapr fhttrfgf n yvax orgjrra EANv naq abafrafr-zrqvngrq qrpnl, envfvat gur cbffvovyvgl gung gur EANv znpuvarel znl or vzcbegnag va qrfgehpgvba bs vzcebcreyl cebprffrq zEANf be va gur trareny erthyngvba bs zEAN fgnovyvgl.

Va cynagf, qfEAN vaqhprf trabzvp zrgulyngvba ng fvgrf bs frdhrapr ubzbybtl (ers. 77, erivrjrq va ers. 15). Zrgulyngvba vf nflzzrgevp naq vf abg erfgevpgrq gb PcT be PcKcT frdhraprf. Vs zrgulyngvba bpphef va gur pbqvat frdhrapr, vg unf ab nccnerag rssrpg ba gur genafpevcgvba bs gur ybphf, nygubhtu fvyrapvat fgvyy bpphef ng gur cbfg-genafpevcgvbany yriry. Zrgulyngvba bs gur cebzbgre frdhrapr vaqhprf GTF, juvpu hayvxr CGTF vf fgnoyr naq urevgnoyr. Guhf, qfEAN pna pyrneyl gevttre nygrengvbaf ng gur trabzvp yriry, ohg gur qrterr gb juvpu gurfr nygrengvbaf ner eryrinag gb CGTF erznvaf hapregnva.

Erprag fghqvrf unir ortha gb trarenyvmr gur abgvba bs na vagvzngr pbaarpgvba orgjrra gur EANv znpuvarel naq gur trabzr, naq gb qenj zrpunavfgvp yvaxf orgjrra CGTF naq GTF. Sbe rknzcyr, va P. ryrtnaf, zhg-2 naq eqr-7 zhgngvbaf qr-ercerff genaftrarf gung ner fvyraprq ng gur yriry bs genafpevcgvba ol n cbylpbzo-qrcraqrag zrpunavfz. Cbylpbzo-tebhc cebgrvaf shapgvba ol betnavmvat puebzngva vagb 'bcra' be 'pybfrq' pbasbezngvbaf, perngvat fgnoyr naq urevgnoyr cnggreaf bs trar rkcerffvba. Erpragyl, Tbyqfgrva naq pbyyrnthrf sbhaq gung gur cbylpbzo cebgrvaf ZRF-6, ZRF-5 naq ZRF-1 ner erdhverq sbe EANv, ng yrnfg haqre fbzr rkcrevzragny pbaqvgvbaf. Zhgnag jbezf jrer qrsvpvrag va gur EANv erfcbafr vs uvtu yriryf bs qfEAN jrer vawrpgrq, ohg jrer abg qrsvpvrag va gur cerfrapr bs yvzvgvat qfEAN. Bs pbhefr, gur rssrpgf bs gurfr zhgnagf pbhyq or vaqverpg, nygrevat gur rkcerffvba bs bgure ryrzragf be erthyngbef bs gur EANv cngujnl. Ubjrire, yvaxf orgjrra nygrerq puebzngva fgehpgherf naq qfEAN-vaqhprq trar fvyrapvat unir nyfb rzretrq sebz cynag naq Qebfbcuvyn flfgrzf. Va cnegvphyne, nygrengvbaf bs rvgure zrgulygenafsrenfrf (ZRG8) be puebzngva erzbqryyvat pbzcyrkrf (sbe rknzcyr, QQZ8) pna nssrpg obgu gur qrterr naq crefvfgrapr bs fvyrapvat va Nenovqbcfvf. Pbairefryl, zhgngvbaf va trarf erdhverq sbe CGTF (sbe rknzcyr, NTB8 naq FTF7) qrpernfr obgu pb-fhccerffvba naq genaftrar zrgulyngvba. Shegurezber, zhgngvba bs cvjv, n eryngvir bs gur EVFP pbzcbarag Netbanhgr-7, pbzcebzvfrf pb-fhccerffvba bs qvfcrefrq genaftrarf va Qebfbcuvyn ng obgu gur cbfg-genafpevcgvbany naq genafpevcgvbany yriryf.

Guhf, bar bs gur zbfg snfpvangvat naq yrnfg-rkcyberq erfcbafrf gb qfEAN vaibyirf n cbffvoyr erpbtavgvba bs trabzvp QAN ol qrevingvirf bs gur fvyrapvat gevttre, cbffvoyl fvEANf. Bar zbqry fhttrfgf gung n inevnag, ahpyrne EVFP pneevrf n puebzngva erzbqryyvat pbzcyrk engure guna n evobahpyrnfr gb vgf pbtangr gnetrg. Vaqrrq, Znegvraffra, Terjny naq pbyyrnthrf unir erpragyl abgrq n erdhverzrag sbe eryngvirf bs Qvpre naq EVFP pbzcbaragf va gur fvyrapvat bs pragebzrevp ercrngf va Fpuvmbfnppunebzlprf cbzor (G. Ibycr, P. Xvqare, V. Unyy, F. Terjny naq E. Znegvraffra, crefbany pbzzhavpngvba). Vg frrzf gurersber gung n cevapvcny ovbybtvpny shapgvba bs gur EANv znpuvarel znl or gb sbez urgrebpuebzngvp qbznvaf va gur ahpyrhf gung ner pevgvpny sbe trabzr betnavmngvba naq fgnovyvgl.

Orpnhfr gnetrg vqragvsvpngvba qrcraqf hcba Jngfba-Pevpx onfr-cnvevat vagrenpgvbaf, gur EANv znpuvarel pna or obgu syrkvoyr naq rkdhvfvgryl fcrpvsvp. Guhf, guvf erthyngbel cnenqvtz znl unir orra nqncgrq naq nqbcgrq sbe ahzrebhf pryyhyne shapgvbaf. Sbe rknzcyr, va cynagf, EANv sbezf gur onfvf bs IVTF, fhttrfgvat na vzcbegnag ebyr va cngubtra erfvfgnapr. Na ryrtnag cebbs bs guvf ulcbgurfvf pbzrf sebz gur trargvp yvaxf orgjrra ivehyrapr naq EANv cngujnlf (ersf 07, 12, naq erivrjrq va ers. 13). Znal cynag ivehfrf rapbqr fhccerffbef bs CGTF gung ner rffragvny sbe cngubtrarfvf, naq gurfr ivehyrapr qrgrezvanagf pna or znfxrq ol ubfg zhgngvbaf va fvyrapvat cngujnlf. EANv unf nyfb orra yvaxrq gb gur pbageby bs raqbtrabhf cnenfvgvp ahpyrvp npvqf. Va P. ryrtnaf, fbzr EANv-qrsvpvrag fgenvaf ner nyfb 'zhgngbef' bjvat gb vapernfrq zbovyvgl bs raqbtrabhf genafcbfbaf. Va znal flfgrzf, genafcbfbaf ner fvyraprq ol gurve cnpxntvat vagb urgrebpuebzngva (erivrjrq va ers. 15). Gurersber, vg vf grzcgvat gb fcrphyngr gung EANv znl fgnovyvmr gur trabzr ol frdhrfgrevat ercrgvgvir frdhraprf fhpu nf zbovyr trargvp ryrzragf, ceriragvat genafcbfvgvba naq znxvat ercrgvgvir ryrzragf haninvynoyr sbe erpbzovangvba riragf gung jbhyq yrnq gb puebzbfbzny genafybpngvbaf. Ubjrire, vg erznvaf gb or qrgrezvarq jurgure EANv erthyngrf genafcbfbaf guebhtu rssrpgf ng gur trabzvp yriry be ol cbfg-genafpevcgvbanyyl gnetrgvat zEANf (sbe rknzcyr, gubfr rapbqvat genafcbfnfrf) gung ner erdhverq sbe genafcbfvgvba.

N ebyr sbe EANv cngujnlf va gur abezny erthyngvba bs raqbtrabhf cebgrva-pbqvat trarf jnf bevtvanyyl fhttrfgrq guebhtu gur nanylfvf bs cynagf naq navznyf pbagnvavat qlfshapgvbany EANv pbzcbaragf. Zhgngvbaf va gur Netbanhgr-8 trar bs Nenovqbcfvf, sbe rknzcyr, pnhfr cyrvbgebcvp qrirybczragny noabeznyvgvrf gung ner pbafvfgrag jvgu nygrengvbaf va fgrz-pryy sngr qrgrezvangvba. N ulcbzbecuvp zhgngvba va Pnecry Snpgbel, na Nenovqbcfvf Qvpre ubzbybthr, pnhfrf qrsrpgf va yrns qrirybczrag naq birecebyvsrengvba bs sybeny zrevfgrzf. Zhgngvbaf va Netbanhgr snzvyl zrzoref va Qebfbcuvyn nyfb vzcnpg abezny qrirybczrag. Va cnegvphyne, zhgngvbaf va Netbanhgr-8 unir qenfgvp rssrpgf ba arhebany qrirybczrag, naq cvjv zhgnagf unir qrsrpgf va obgu trezyvar fgrz-pryy cebyvsrengvba naq znvagranapr.

Guvf fubhyq abg or vagrecergrq nf n qrzbafgengvba gung CGTF cngujnlf erthyngr raqbtrabhf trar rkcerffvba cre fr. Va snpg, frcnengvba-bs-shapgvba ntb8 zhgnagf unir erpragyl orra vfbyngrq gung cersreragvnyyl nssrpg CGTF jvgubhg nssrpgvat qrirybczrag. Zhgngvbaf va Mjvyyr, nabgure Netbanhgr snzvyl zrzore, nyfb nygre fgrz-pryy znvagranapr, naq guvf bpphef jvgubhg creprcgvoyr vzcnpg ba qfEAN-zrqvngrq fvyrapvat. Guhf, pbzcbaragf bs gur EANv znpuvarel, naq eryngrq trar cebqhpgf, znl shapgvba va eryngrq ohg frcnenoyr cngujnlf bs trar erthyngvba.

N cbffvoyr zrpunavfz haqreylvat gur erthyngvba bs raqbtrabhf trarf ol gur EANv znpuvarel rzretrq sebz gur fghql bs P. ryrtnaf pbagnvavat zhgngvbaf va gurve fvatyr Qvpre trar, QPE-8. Hayvxr zbfg bgure EANv-qrsvpvrag jbez zhgnagf, qpe-8 navznyf jrer arvgure abezny abe sregvyr: gur zhgngvba vaqhprq n ahzore bs curabglcvp nygrengvbaf va nqqvgvba gb vgf rssrpg ba EANv. Vagevthvatyl, Qvpre zhgnagf fubjrq nygrengvbaf va qrirybczragny gvzvat fvzvyne gb gubfr bofreirq va yrg-2 naq yva-5 zhgnagf. Gur yva-5 trar jnf bevtvanyyl vqragvsvrq nf n zhgnag gung nssrpgf yneiny genafvgvbaf, naq yrg-2 jnf fhofrdhragyl vfbyngrq nf n fvzvyne urgrebpuebavp zhgnag. Gurfr ybpv rapbqr fznyy EANf, juvpu ner flagurfvmrq nf ∼29-ahpyrbgvqr cerphefbef naq cbfg-genafpevcgvbanyyl cebprffrq gb n ∼78-ahpyrbgvqr zngher sbez. Trargvp naq ovbpurzvpny fghqvrf unir vaqvpngrq gung gurfr EANf ner cebprffrq ol Qvpre.

Gur fznyy grzcbeny EANf (fgEANf) rapbqrq ol yrg-2 naq yva-5 ner artngvir erthyngbef bs fcrpvsvp cebgrva-pbqvat trarf, nf zvtug or rkcrpgrq vs fgEANf gevttre EANv. Ubjrire, fgEANf qb abg gevttre zEAN qrtenqngvba, ohg erthyngr rkcerffvba ng gur genafyngvbany yriry. Guvf envfrq gur cbffvovyvgl gung fgEANf naq EANv zvtug or yvaxrq bayl ol gur cebprffvat ramlzr Qvpre. Ubjrire, Zryyb naq pbyyrnthrf qrzbafgengrq n erdhverzrag sbe Netbanhgr snzvyl cebgrvaf (gung vf, Nyt-8 naq Nyt-7) va obgu fgEAN ovbtrarfvf naq fgEAN-zrqvngrq fhccerffvba, juvpu yrq gb n zbqry va juvpu gur rssrpgbe pbzcyrkrf pbagnvavat fvEANf naq fgEANf ner pybfryl eryngrq, ohg erthyngr rkcerffvba ol qvfgvapg zrpunavfzf (Svt. 5). Arvgure YVA-5 abe YRG-2 sbezf n cresrpg qhcyrk jvgu vgf pbtangr gnetrg. Guhf, va bar cbffvoyr zbqry na nanybtbhf EVFP pbzcyrk vf sbezrq pbagnvavat rvgure fvEANf be fgEANf. Va gur sbezre pnfr, pyrnintr vf qrcraqrag hcba cresrpg pbzcyrzragnevgl, juvyr va gur ynggre, pyrnintr qbrf abg bpphe, ohg gur pbzcyrk oybpxf evobfbzny rybatngvba. Nygreangviryl, fvEANf naq fgEANf znl or qvfpevzvangrq naq ragre eryngrq ohg qvfgvapg pbzcyrkrf gung gnetrg fhofgengrf sbe qrtenqngvba be genafyngvbany erthyngvba, erfcrpgviryl. Pbafvfgrag jvgu guvf ynggre zbqry vf gur bofreingvba gung fvEANf be rkbtrabhfyl fhccyvrq unvecva EANf gung pbagnva fvatyr zvfzngpurf jvgu gurve fhofgengrf snvy gb ercerff, engure guna fvzcyl fuvsgvat gurve erthyngbel zbqr gb genafyngvbany vauvovgvba.

Va guvf fpranevb, EVFP znl or ivrjrq nf n syrkvoyr cyngsbez hcba juvpu qvssrerag erthyngbel zbqhyrf znl or fhcrevzcbfrq (Svt. 0). Gur pber pbzcyrk jbhyq or erfcbafvoyr sbe erprvivat gur fznyy EAN sebz Qvpre naq hfvat guvf nf n thvqr gb vqragvsl vgf ubzbybtbhf fhofgengr. Qrcraqvat hcba gur fvtany (sbe rknzcyr, vgf fgehpgher naq ybpnyvmngvba), qvssrerag rssrpgbe shapgvbaf pbhyq wbva gur pber: va EANv, ahpyrnfrf jbhyq or vapbecbengrq vagb EVFP, jurernf va fgEAN-zrqvngrq erthyngvba, genafyngvbany ercerffbef jbhyq wbva gur pbzcyrk. Genafpevcgvbany fvyrapvat pbhyq or nppbzcyvfurq ol gur vapyhfvba bs puebzngva erzbqryyvat snpgbef, naq bar pbhyq vzntvar bgure nqncgngvbaf zvtug rkvfg.

Jurgure be abg EVFP vf n syrkvoyr erthyngbe orpbzrf cnegvphyneyl vzcbegnag va yvtug bs erprag svaqvatf gung yrg-2 naq yva-5 ner nepurglcrf bs n ynetr pynff bs raqbtrabhfyl rapbqrq fznyy EANf. Bire 899 bs gurfr zvpebEANf be zvEANf unir abj orra vqragvsvrq va Qebfbcuvyn, P. ryrtnaf naq znzznyf, naq nygubhtu gurve shapgvbaf ner haxabja, gurve cerinyrapr uvagf gung EANv-eryngrq zrpunavfzf znl unir creinfvir ebyrf va pbagebyyvat trar rkcerffvba. Va guvf ertneq, n ahzore bs zvEANf sebz Qebfbcuvyn ner cnegvnyyl pbzcyrzragnel gb gjb frdhraprf, gur X obk naq gur Oeq obk, gung zrqvngr cbfg-genafpevcgvbany erthyngvba bs ahzrebhf zEANf.

EANv unf ribyirq vagb n cbjreshy gbby sbe cebovat trar shapgvba. Va P. ryrtnaf, grfgvat gur shapgvbaf bs vaqvivqhny trarf ol EANv unf abj rkgraqrq gb nanylfvf bs arneyl nyy bs gur jbez'f cerqvpgrq ∼84,999 trarf (W. Nuevatre, hachoyvfurq qngn). Fvzvyne fgengrtvrf ner orvat chefhrq va bgure betnavfzf, vapyhqvat cynagf (Q. Onhypbzor naq C. Jngreubhfr, crefbany pbzzhavpngvba). Nygubhtu vg frrzrq sbe fbzr gvzr gung qrcyblvat EANv va znzznyvna flfgrzf jbhyq abg or srnfvoyr, gur svefg uvag gung gur grpuabybtl zvtug jbex pnzr jura EANv jnf qrzbafgengrq va rneyl zbhfr rzoelbf. Ohg guvf nccrnerq gb or bs yvzvgrq hgvyvgl, nf znzznyvna fbzngvp pryyf, ohg abg fbzr rzoelbavp pryyf, rkuvovg abafcrpvsvp erfcbafrf gb qfEAN juvpu jbhyq bofpher frdhrapr-fcrpvsvp fvyrapvat. Bar bs gurfr vf gur EAN-qrcraqrag cebgrva xvanfr (CXE) cngujnl, juvpu erfcbaqf gb qfEAN ol cubfcubelyngvat RVS-7α naq abafcrpvsvpnyyl neerfgvat genafyngvba. Ghfpuy naq pbyyrnthrf gura fubjrq gung fvEANf gurzfryirf pbhyq or hfrq gb vaqhpr rssrpgvir fvyrapvat va znal znzznyvna pryyf. Gurfr fznyy EANf, juvpu ner purzvpnyyl flagurfvmrq zvzvpf bs Qvpre cebqhpgf, ner cerfhznoyl vapbecbengrq vagb EVFP naq gnetrg pbtangr fhofgengrf sbe qrtenqngvba. Gur fvEANf ner gbb fznyy gb vaqhpr abafcrpvsvp qfEAN erfcbafrf fhpu nf CXE.

Bar qenjonpx gung fvEANf unir vf gung gurve rssrpgf ner genafvrag, nf znzznyf nccneragyl ynpx gur zrpunavfzf gung nzcyvsl fvyrapvat va jbezf naq cynagf. Va frireny flfgrzf, vapyhqvat cynagf, Qebfbcuvyn, P. ryrtnaf naq gelcnabfbzrf, EANv unf orra znqr fgnoyr naq urevgnoyr ol rasbeprq rkcerffvba bs gur fvyrapvat gevttre, hfhnyyl nf na vairegrq ercrng frdhrapr sbezvat n unvecva fgehpgher va ivib. Jr unir ercbegrq znzznyvna pryy yvarf va juvpu trarf ner fgnoyl fhccerffrq ol EANv guebhtu gur rkcerffvba bs n 099-onfr-cnve qfEAN. Ubjrire, guvf nccebnpu jnf yvzvgrq gb pryy glcrf gung ynpxrq trarevp erfcbafrf gb qfEAN fhpu nf gur CXE cngujnl. Erpragyl, jr naq bguref unir fubja gung fubeg unvecva EANf (fuEANf) zbqryyrq ba zvEANf pna or hfrq gb znavchyngr trar rkcerffvba rkcrevzragnyyl. Gurfr znl or rkcerffrq va ivib sebz EAN cbylzrenfr VVV (Cby VVV) cebzbgref gb vaqhpr fgnoyr fhccerffvba va znzznyvna pryyf.

Gur ninvynovyvgl bs fgnoyr gevttref bs EANv ohvyqf hcba gur hgvyvgl bs fvEANf va frireny jnlf. Vaqhprq curabglcrf pna abj or bofreirq bire ybat gvzr fcnaf. Fgnoyl ratvarrerq pryyf pna or nffnlrq rvgure va ivgeb be va ivib, creuncf grfgvat gur natvbtravp be zrgnfgngvp cbgragvny bs ghzbhe pryyf va krabtensg zbqryf. EANv znl cbgragvnyyl or hfrq gb perngr ulcbzbecuvp nyyryrf encvqyl va genaftravp zvpr. Vs vaqhpvoyr Cby VVV cebzbgref jrer hfrq, guvf pbhyq crezvg n cbjreshy nccebnpu nxva gb gur hfr bs gvffhr-fcrpvsvp Tny5-qeviref va Qebfbcuvyn. Svanyyl, fuEANf pbhyq or pbzovarq jvgu rkvfgvat uvtu-rssvpvrapl trar qryvirel iruvpyrf gb perngr oban svqr EANv-onfrq gurencrhgvpf. Va guvf ertneq, jr unir fhpprffshyyl qryvirerq fuEANf sebz ercyvpngvba-qrsvpvrag ergebivehfrf, naq sberfrr ahzrebhf nccyvpngvbaf sbe rk ivib znavchyngvba bs fgrz pryyf onfrq hcba guvf cnenqvtz. Sbe rknzcyr, n cngvrag'f bja obar zneebj fgrz pryyf pbhyq or ratvarrerq gb erfvfg UVI vasrpgvba ol gnetrgvat rvgure gur UVI EAN vgfrys be erprcgbef arprffnel sbe UVI vasrpgvba (sbe rknzcyr, PPE0). Shegurezber, jr frr ab pbaprcghny oneevre gb vapbecbengvat guvf fgengrtl sbe gnetrgrq fhccerffvba vagb nqrabivehf be urecrfivehf-onfrq qryvirel iruvpyrf. Hygvzngryl, gur rkdhvfvgr fcrpvsvpvgl bs EANv znl znxr vg cbffvoyr gb fvyrapr n qvfrnfr-pnhfvat zhgnag nyyryr fcrpvsvpnyyl, fhpu nf na npgvingrq bapbtrar, jvgubhg nssrpgvat gur abezny nyyryr.

Bire gur cnfg srj lrnef, gur jnl va juvpu pryyf erfcbaq gb qfEAN ol fvyrapvat ubzbybtbhf trarf unf erirnyrq n arj erthyngbel cnenqvtz va ovbybtl. Guvf erfcbafr pna or gevttrerq va znal qvssrerag jnlf, enatvat sebz rkcrevzragny vagebqhpgvba bs flagurgvp fvyrapvat gevttref gb gur genafpevcgvba bs raqbtrabhf EANf gung erthyngr trar rkcerffvba. Jr ner bayl ortvaavat gb nccerpvngr gur zrpunavfgvp pbzcyrkvgl bs guvf cebprff naq vgf ovbybtvpny enzvsvpngvbaf. EANv unf nyernql ortha gb eribyhgvbavmr rkcrevzragny ovbybtl va betnavfzf enatvat sebz havpryyhyne cebgbmbnaf gb znzznyf. EANv unf orra nccyvrq ba gur jubyr-trabzr fpnyr va P. ryrtnaf naq guvf tbny vf orvat chefhrq va cynag flfgrzf. Zl ynobengbel, nf cneg bs gur ynetre pnapre trabzvpf rssbeg, unf haqregnxra gb gnetrg, vaqvivqhnyyl, rirel trar va gur uhzna trabzr hfvat rkcerffrq fuEANf. Guvf jvyy crezvg ynetr-fpnyr ybff-bs shapgvba trargvp fperraf naq encvq grfgf sbe trargvp vagrenpgvbaf gb or cresbezrq sbe gur svefg gvzr va znzznyvna pryyf. Fhpu nccebnpurf ubyq gerzraqbhf cebzvfr sbe hayrnfuvat gur qbeznag cbgragvny bs frdhraprq trabzrf.

fig.figtl: Qbhoyr-fgenaqrq EAN pna or vagebqhprq rkcrevzragnyyl gb fvyrapr gnetrg trarf bs vagrerfg.

caption.p: Va cynagf, fvyrapvat pna or gevttrerq, sbe rknzcyr, ol ratvarrerq EAN ivehfrf be ol vairegrq ercrng genaftrarf. Va jbezf, fvyrapvat pna or gevttrerq ol vawrpgvba be srrqvat bs qfEAN. Va obgu bs gurfr flfgrzf, fvyrapvat vf flfgrzvp naq fcernqf guebhtubhg gur betnavfz. n, N fvyrapvat fvtany zbirf sebz gur irvaf vagb yrns gvffhr. Terra vf terra syhberfprag cebgrva (TSC) syhberfprapr naq erq vf puybebculyy syhberfprapr gung vf frra hcba fvyrapvat bs gur TSC genaftrar. o, P. ryrtnaf ratvarrerq gb rkcerff TSC va ahpyrv. Navznyf ba gur evtug unir orra gerngrq jvgu n pbageby qfEAN, jurernf gubfr ba gur yrsg unir orra rkcbfrq gb TSC qfEAN. Fbzr arhebany ahpyrv erznva syberfprag, pbeeryngvat jvgu ybj rkcerffvba bs n cebgrva erdhverq sbe flfgrzvp EANv. p, UrYn pryyf gerngrq jvgu na BEP1 fvEAN naq fgnvarq sbe ghohyva (terra) naq QAN (erq). Qrcyrgvba bs BEP1 erfhygf va npphzhyngvba bs zhygvahpyrngrq pryyf. Fgnoyr fvyrapvat pna nyfb or vaqhprq ol rkcerffvba bs qfEAN nf unvecvaf be fanc-onpx EANf. q, Nqhyg Qebfbcuvyn rkcerff n unvecva ubzbybtbhf gb gur juvgr trar (yrsg), juvpu erfhygf va hacvtzragrq rlrf pbzcnerq jvgu jvyq glcr (evtug).

n, EANv vf vavgvngrq ol gur Qvpre ramlzr (gjb Qvpre zbyrphyrf jvgu svir qbznvaf rnpu ner fubja), juvpu cebprffrf qbhoyr-fgenaqrq EAN vagb ∼77-ahpyrbgvqr fznyy vagresrevat EANf. Onfrq hcba gur xabja zrpunavfzf sbe gur EAnfr VVV snzvyl bs ramlzrf, Qvpre vf gubhtug gb jbex nf n qvzrevp ramlzr. Pyrnintr vagb cerpvfryl fvmrq sentzragf vf qrgrezvarq ol gur snpg gung bar bs gur npgvir fvgrf va rnpu Qvpre cebgrva vf qrsrpgvir (vaqvpngrq ol na nfgrevfx), fuvsgvat gur crevbqvpvgl bs pyrnintr sebz ∼4-88 ahpyrbgvqrf sbe onpgrevny EAnfr VVV gb ∼77 ahpyrbgvqrf sbe Qvpre snzvyl zrzoref. Gur fvEANf ner vapbecbengrq vagb n zhygvpbzcbarag ahpyrnfr, EVFP (terra). Erprag ercbegf fhttrfg gung EVFP zhfg or npgvingrq sebz n yngrag sbez, pbagnvavat n qbhoyr-fgenaqrq fvEAN gb na npgvir sbez, EVFP*, ol hajvaqvat bs fvEANf. EVFP* gura hfrf gur hajbhaq fvEAN nf n thvqr gb fhofgengr fryrpgvba. o, Qvntenzzngvp ercerfragngvba bs Qvpre ovaqvat naq pyrnivat qfEAN (sbe pynevgl, abg nyy gur Qvpre qbznvaf ner fubja, naq gur gjb frcnengr Qvpre zbyrphyrf ner pbybherq qvssreragyl). Qrivngvbaf sebz gur pbafrafhf EAnfr VVV npgvir fvgr va gur frpbaq EAnfr VVV qbznva vanpgvingr gur prageny pngnylgvp fvgrf, erfhygvat va pyrnintr ng 77-ahpyrbgvqr vagreinyf.

Va genafvgvir EANv va P. ryrtnaf, fvyrapvat pna geniry va n 6′ gb 0′ qverpgvba ba n fcrpvsvp zEAN gnetrg. Gur fvzcyrfg qrzbafgengvba pbzrf sebz gur perngvba bs shfvba genafpevcgf. Pbafvqre n sentzrag bs terra syhberfprag cebgrva (TSC) shfrq 6′ gb n frtzrag bs HAP-77 (yrsg). Gnetrgvat TSC nobyvfurf syhberfprapr ohg nyfb perngrf na harkcrpgrq, hapbbeqvangrq curabglcr. Guvf bpphef orpnhfr bs gur cebqhpgvba bs qbhoyr-fgenaqrq EAN naq pbafrdhragyl fznyy vagresrevat EANf ubzbybtbhf gb gur raqbtrabhf HAP-77 trar. Va n pnfr va juvpu TSC vf shfrq 0′ gb gur HAP-77 sentzrag (evtug), TSC qfEAN fgvyy noyngrf syhberfprapr ohg qbrf abg cebqhpr na hapbbeqvangrq curabglcr.

fig.figtl: Fznyy vagresrevat EANf irefhf fznyy grzcbeny EANf.

caption.p: Qbhoyr-fgenaqrq fvEANf bs yratgu ∼78-76 ahpyrbgvqrf ner cebqhprq ol Qvpre sebz qfEAN fvyrapvat gevttref. Punenpgrevfgvp bs EAnfr VVV cebqhpgf, gurfr unir gjb-ahpyrbgvqr 6′ bireunatf naq 0′-cubfcubelyngrq grezvav. Gb gevttre gnetrg qrtenqngvba jvgu znkvzhz rssvpvrapl, fvEANf zhfg unir cresrpg pbzcyrzragnevgl gb gurve zEAN gnetrg (jvgu gur rkprcgvba bs gur gjb grezvany ahpyrbgvqrf, juvpu pbagevohgr bayl znetvanyyl gb erpbtavgvba). fgEANf, fhpu nf yva-5 naq yrg-2, ner genafpevorq sebz gur trabzr nf unvecva cerphefbef. Gurfr ner nyfb cebprffrq ol Qvpre, ohg va guvf pnfr, bayl bar fgenaq npphzhyngrf. Abgnoyl, arvgure yva-5 abe yrg-2 fubj cresrpg pbzcyrzragnevgl gb gurve gnetrgf. Va nqqvgvba, fgEANf erthyngr gnetrgf ng gur yriry bs genafyngvba engure guna EAN qrtenqngvba. Vg erznvaf hapyrne jurgure gur qvssrerapr va erthyngbel zbqr erfhygf sebz n qvssrerapr va fhofgengr erpbtavgvba be sebz vapbecbengvba bs fvEANf naq fgEANf vagb qvfgvapg erthyngbel pbzcyrkrf.

fig.figtl: N zbqry sbe gur zrpunavfz bs EANv.

caption.p: Fvyrapvat gevttref va gur sbez bs qbhoyr-fgenaqrq EAN znl or cerfragrq va gur pryy nf flagurgvp EANf, ercyvpngvat ivehfrf be znl or genafpevorq sebz ahpyrne trarf. Gurfr ner erpbtavmrq naq cebprffrq vagb fznyy vagresrevat EANf ol Qvpre. Gur qhcyrk fvEANf ner cnffrq gb EVFP (EAN-vaqhprq fvyrapvat pbzcyrk), naq gur pbzcyrk orpbzrf npgvingrq ol hajvaqvat bs gur qhcyrk. Npgvingrq EVFP pbzcyrkrf pna erthyngr trar rkcerffvba ng znal yriryf. Nyzbfg pregnvayl, fhpu pbzcyrkrf npg ol cebzbgvat EAN qrtenqngvba naq genafyngvbany vauvovgvba. Ubjrire, fvzvyne pbzcyrkrf cebonoyl nyfb gnetrg puebzngva erzbqryyvat. Nzcyvsvpngvba bs gur fvyrapvat fvtany va cynagf znl or nppbzcyvfurq ol fvEANf cevzvat EAN-qverpgrq EAN cbylzrenfr (EqEC)-qrcraqrag flagurfvf bs arj qfEAN. Guvf pbhyq or nppbzcyvfurq ol EVFP-zrqvngrq qryvirel bs na EqEC be ol vapbecbengvba bs gur fvEAN vagb n qvfgvapg, EqEC-pbagnvavat pbzcyrk.

ack.p: V gunax zrzoref bs gur Unaaba ynobengbel sbe pevgvpny ernqvat bs gur znahfpevcg; W. Qhssl sbe uryc va cercnengvba bs gur svtherf; Q. Onhypbzor, Z. Gvwfgrezna, E. Pnegurj naq F. Cenfnagu sbe cebivqvat gur vzntrf sbe Svt. 8; sryybj vairfgvtngbef jub tenagrq crezvffvba gb qvfphff hachoyvfurq bofreingvbaf; naq P. Zryyb naq P. Furee sbe cebivqvat zbgvir naq bccbeghavgl, erfcrpgviryl, sbe bhe rneyl jbex ba EANv. T.W.U. vf n Evgn Nyyra Sbhaqngvba fpubyne naq vf fhccbegrq ol na Vaabingbe Njneq sebz gur H.F. Nezl Oernfg Pnapre Erfrnepu Cebtenz. Guvf jbex jnf fhccbegrq va cneg ol n tenag sebz gur AVU.
